paper.title: Software Engineering or Methods for the Multi - Person Construction of Multi - Version Programs

author.org: Technische Hochschule Darmstadt Fachbereich Informatik, Betriebssysteme I

paper.abstract: This talk will describe some methods which have been used to produce a family of related software products using many relatively unskilled programmers. The primary topics of the talk will :[30],"interpretation of the word "structure" with regard to to :[39],"be used in decomposing software into :[47],"and techniques with regard to software module specifications.
